en: You find your focus drifting away from work. You don't feel all that well tonight, either.
Breaks are important. Getting sick will set you back weeks, and you can't afford that.
You criticize yourself, frogmarch yourself through the laziness, and get everything done. But, my goodness how exhausted you feel afterwards.
You criticize yourself to get through the laziness and get everything done, but feel exhausted afterwards.
You criticize yourself to get through the laziness and get everything done, but feel exhausted afterwards.
